cmp: 回 ((a measure word for matters or actions) a time/to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Islam)
禀 (natural property or endowment/report to (a superior))
mng: cold, to shiver with cold, to tremble with fear, afraid, apprehensive, strict, stern, severe, austere, awe-inspiring, imposing, majestic

exm.mng: devotion to righteousness that inspires reverence (idiom)
The north wind is icy cold.
